cpPolyShape* cpPolyShapeInit ( cpPolyShape *  poly,
cpBody *  body,
int  numVerts,
cpVect *  verts,
cpVect  offset 
)

Initialize a polygon shape.

The vertexes must be convex and have a clockwise winding.
